data.actual_result: screen shakes, counter increases, reaction part goes back to grey, counter stays increased till you switch channels
data.expected_result: counter increases, screen shakes, counter decreases
data.short_description: Trying to add a reaction to someone that blocked you increases the number until you switch channels
data.steps_to_repro: - get someone to block you (not telling you how) - get them to post something and let others react to it - try to click on one of those reactions to add it - watch the screen shake violently as it fails (intended behaviour) - watch the counter still increase
